## **Who says quality can’t be affordable?**

Hi, I’m Steve Shannon, and after nearly four decades in broadcasting, I’d like to offer my expertise and talent to any project you have that requires a voice! From training videos to on-hold messages to TV commercials… heck, if you need a voice over for Uncle Fred and Aunt Wilma’s 50th anniversary video, I’ll help you out!

My specialty is fully-produced radio commercials. From concept to completion, including script-writing, I can have a spot ready for airplay within 24 hours at a price that makes sense for you! After all, your “professional” voice guy isn’t the only one who should be making money!

Please check out my demos, and I look forward to hearing from you soon and working with you often!
